price: 凭主的许可，按时结果。安拉为众人打了许多比方，以便他们记取教诲。
arabic: تُؤۡتِيٓ أُكُلَهَا كُلَّ حِينِۭ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهَاۗ وَيَضۡرِبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: tu'tī ukulahā kulla ḥīnin bi-idh'ni rabbihā wayaḍribu al-lahu al-amthāla lilnnāsi laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
